X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Dec 2000 19:59:06.0397 (UTC) FILETIME=[509334D0:01C06608]
From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* The little black piff zoomed through the trees,humming off tune, ramming 
into trees whatever was in his way, not slowing down, as would be the smart 
thing to do, but speeding up, sure that speed would get him where he was 
going. He ran into a young sapling, bounced off of it and rammed full-speed 
into a full grown tree, rebounding off of it and shooting out of the canopy. 
He faded into a small black speck and was lost to the large night sky.*

*the small lynx-like creature/bot in Iron Raptors hands began to wiggle 
about, still too scared to break loose, but too excited to keep still. He 
wiggled and tickled IR's hand with his fur, then looked up at her and 
mewed.*

" Meeeooooowwwwwww!"

* In his excitment he let out a small exscreation of gas.

" Ppffftttttt!"

* The gas did not stink, though it was extremely loud. he looked around in 
embarrasment at the other bots. He licked her hand as an apology and mewed 
again to her.*

" Meeewwwwww?"
